help.short: The name of the recovery services vault.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="allowedOperations">
<prop type="array" name="groups">
<prop type="array<@RecoveryPlanAction_read>" name="endGroupActions">
<prop type="array" name="replicationProtectedItems">
<prop type="array" name="startGroupActions">
<prop type="array" name="failoverDirections" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="failoverTypes" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="providerSpecificDetails">
<prop type="array" name="replicationProviders">

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the recovery services vault.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$input.properties.groups" options="groups" required="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@RecoveryPlanAction_create>" var="$input.properties.groups[].endGroupActions" options="end-group-actions">
<arg type="array" var="$input.properties.groups[].replicationProtectedItems" options="replication-protected-items">
<arg type="array" var="$input.properties.groups[].startGroupActions" options="start-group-actions">
<arg type="array" var="@RecoveryPlanAction_create.failoverDirections" options="failover-directions" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="@RecoveryPlanAction_create.failoverTypes" options="failover-types" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$input.properties.providerSpecificInput" options="provider-specific-input provider-input" group="Properties">

command.name: update

help.short: The name of the recovery services vault.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$input.properties.groups" options="groups" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@RecoveryPlanAction_update>" var="$input.properties.groups[].endGroupActions" options="end-group-actions">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$input.properties.groups[].replicationProtectedItems" options="replication-protected-items">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$input.properties.groups[].startGroupActions" options="start-group-actions">
<arg type="array" var="@RecoveryPlanAction_update.failoverDirections" options="failover-directions">
<arg type="array" var="@RecoveryPlanAction_update.failoverTypes" options="failover-types">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$input.properties.providerSpecificInput" options="provider-specific-input provider-input" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="allowedOperations">
<prop type="array" name="groups">

<prop type="array" name="startGroupActions">

<prop type="array" name="failoverTypes" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="providerSpecificDetails">
<prop type="array" name="replicationProviders">

<prop type="array" name="groups" arg="$input.properties.groups" required="True">
<prop type="array<@RecoveryPlanAction_update>" name="endGroupActions" arg="$input.properties.groups[].endGroupActions">
<prop type="array" name="replicationProtectedItems" arg="$input.properties.groups[].replicationProtectedItems">
<prop type="array" name="startGroupActions" arg="$input.properties.groups[].startGroupActions">
<prop type="array" name="failoverDirections" arg="@RecoveryPlanAction_update.failoverDirections" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="failoverTypes" arg="@RecoveryPlanAction_update.failoverTypes" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="providerSpecificInput" arg="$input.properties.providerSpecificInput">
